hyp_text: USA Gymnastics and the USOC are on the same page - to promote a culture of safety and well-being, which allows athletes to thrive and reach their full potential, and to provide a safe and supportive environment for all, both on and off the field.
prompt:

[Kikongo]: Na kutala, ba Français yonso ke tubaka ndinga ya ba ya baBelge na ya baSuisse longukaka Français na universite na yina bo ke kuwa nge mbot mbote kana nge ke na kuwakana Français mutindu bo.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kikongo]: Na nima ya nkama ya bamvula, bantu me kuyidika na ngemba yonso bisika ya kuvwandila mpi kupemisa nitu ya kutalana na meso ya bantu na me tadisa na mabundu ne ke pesa pumpala yonso ya mabundu.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kikongo]: Bakilometre 800 ya résaux ya Pipeline Trans-Alaska vandaka ya kukanga sambu na bangungulu ya petrole mingi yayi kupanzanaka na sudi ya Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kikongo]: Bitini ya Belgique ya bubu yai vandaka ntete na kati ya Luxembourg na ntangu ya ntama kansi yo kumaka ya Belgique na nima ya Revolution ya Belgique ya 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kikongo]: Banda kundima ya bo, Onion kumama kimfumu ya nene, ya kuzabakana na mikanda, kisika ya webi yina ke na banzenza 5 000 000 ke talaka yo na ngonda ya kumi, bansangu ya kuzabakana, kumwangisa bansagu ya bo ba ngunga 24, podcast, la buku ya nene me mwangana ntoto yonso to atlas na zina ya Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Mutindu NSA, yandi salaka na Carter na mambu me tadila kumonisa insi na mambu ya ntoto ya muvimba, mutindu Kuwakana ya Camp David, na 1978; sambu na kuvutula nsalasaki ya kintuadi kati na Amerika -Chine na 1970; Kimpwanza ya bana ya Iran, yina nataka mpasi ya Iran na 1979; na luyalu ya Afganistan na kukota ya bantu ya Sovietique na 1979.
ref_text: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
hyp_text: The NSA director briefed Carter on the situation, highlighting the crisis in the Horn of Africa, the Camp David Accord in 1978; the rapprochement between America and China in 1970; the Iran hostage crisis, which led to the Iran-Iraq war in 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.

src_text: Bangindu mingi ya ke tadila Déterministe Technologique ke vandaka ti mabanza zole: kuyela ya technologie yo mosi ke landaka nzila yina ke wakana ve ti bupusi ya kinkulu to ya politiki, mpe nde technologie ke vandaka na "boupusi" na luzingu ya bantu kele ya kuwakana kansi ve mambu ya luzingu.
ref_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
hyp_text: Many Determinist Technologists have argued that technology is a neutral tool: the development of a technology follows a path that is determined by its own internal logic, rather than by political or social factors, and that technology is in itself neutral, but it is the use that people make of it that is not neutral.
